data.description:
FIGHT with any weapon you can find against different enemies in the Hex7 Arenas. 
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
                                                                                                                                                                       
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031640_1611492052972544_8434024045580790583_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=-ndYMK1urg8Q7kNvgFzQFUU&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBqwwsZUc-hEgYSeFH3vYq4JqBrT9G2Af_Z_d5FpUk-Rg&oe=66EE89CC)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game as much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39035393_1502492917145105_2500292279720560247_n.png?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=gDeEOo9gAkUQ7kNvgEpPyBh&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBfJzRD-utV1CjybmIfA1M3FMlOf_ONFjG9Y7lB0FERQA&oe=66EEC01F)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75392879_331169873202633_892518978300243902_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=Sl9ar59Cvc4Q7kNvgEzhGX-&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAcJ3FVDAS8NC1x7-mOQn2Rnp5j4WcAx0c6opvAVmdDxw&oe=66EEA571)
